author: Jeremy Simon
comment: Nice looking app.  Doesn't play well if you are using a Calendar/Email app that is not the phone's default.  Use it mostly for setting up conference calls and web meetings.
Saves time and money while keeping you on track!!

author: Amanda Weatherford
comment: So far think this will be a great tool!

author: Mark Richards
comment: Great application that removes the pain of dialing in to conference calls.  1 touch dialing and an editor to choose the correct numbers when the calendar invite has multiple listed.

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Mark, Apologies for the trouble that you experienced. Would you please contact our help desk at help@agenday.com and they will be able to assist you with this issue. Thank you for using Agenday! Best, Agenday Product Team

author: Jason Robins
comment: Great app for conference call management.

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Jason, Thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you find Agenday useful for your conference calls. Best, Agenday Product Team

author: Caitlin Korab
comment: So easy to use for calls-keeps track of all appointments, call in numbers, locations. Can help sync personal and business appointments to keep my calendar straight.

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your positive feedback! Best, Agenday Product Team

title: Great app for mobile conference calls!

author: Yaniv Meyer
comment: Why can the app not identify my LOCAL dial in number knowing my current location? 5 stars if it could do that.

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Yaniv, thank you for this feedback. Agenday does automatically dial your local number for any iMeet, GlobalMeet, GlobalMeet Audio or Powwownow conference. If you use a different conference provider, our patented logic can be leveraged for you or company via an enterprise license of Agenday! If interested, please visit www.agenday.com/enterprise .

title: Missing major piece of logic

author: Hines Richardson
comment: The app is great for meeting with a conference call. I wish you could suppress it for in personal meetings (meeting without a phone#)

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for your positive feedback! Best, Agenday Product Team

author: Earl Henry
comment: I depend so much on this app for work but stop working on my Nexus 6. After initial configuration would not pickup my calendar events. Then App would get stuck on splash screen.

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Earl, we apologize about the issue! Are you still experiencing this same problem or any others with Agenday? If so, do you mind emailing help@agenday.com and mentioning the issue? We have no known issues with Nexus 6 phones at this time but would love to engage with you to find out more. Thank you, Earl.

title: Stop working on my Nexus 6

author: Jessica Harris-Titus
comment: So easy. It really makes conference calls soother...especially when you are mobile.

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Jessica, thank you so much for leaving this feedback!

title: Love it.

author: Doug Conley
comment: I use this app to keep track of appointments, birthdays; you name it! If you want a good personal assistant, this is the app for you!

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Doug, thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! Keep on  calendaring! We're here to serve you at help@agenday.com if you have any other thoughts, questions or feedback!

title: Great App

author: Franklin Tobor
comment: AGENDAY APP LOVE IT KEEPS ME ON TIME & GOING

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Thank you for the positive feedback! Keep on calendaring!

author: Ravi Madabhushanam
comment: Kept crashing

reply.author: Premiere Global Services, Inc.
reply.content: Hi Ravi, Apologies for the trouble that you experienced. We have recently done some performance improvements and fixed bugs, we would request you to upgrade to the latest version of the app. Thanks, Agenday Product Team

author: Eran Carmel
comment: A bit slow and some small annoying things but can't live without it
title: Very useful

author: Samuel McCain
comment: It's my first time....Nothing neg to report as of now
title: Using the 1st Time

author: Cheryl Lynn
comment: I love having everything in one place. It really simplifies scheduling and connecting to meetings.
title: Simple& convenient

author: Flash Gordon
comment: Love the new free/busy feature - true calendaring innovation. Also Lync integration is awesome and very relevant! Keep it up!
title: Just keeps getting better!

author: Charles Guillory
comment: I wish that you would make a version that's compatible with my tab 4. If you did that I could rate the app 5 stars. This is a very good app.
title: Tab 4

author: Jaci Volz
comment: This is a great app! It is simple to use and combines all your calendars into one easy read calendar. You can also join a conference call with a touch of a button. I would highly suggest this app!

author: S. Gates
comment: So I have been using this for about a month and overall it is convenient. Most of the time it works well, sometimes it misdials the WebEx meeting ID with no rhyme or reason. It also does not respect the alert times set in a calendar entry, so it can get annoying receiving alerts for an entry that isn't supposed to have them.
title: Helpful but has flaws

author: Baz Helsden
comment: Great app, especially the ability to auto dial conference call numbers with the pin code. One minute suggestion, the ability to change widget font/size would be nice :) Thanks
title: Really helpful

author: Twin Mom
comment: Very easy to use. I love that I can join a conference call or webinar with one click.
title: Quick and easy

author: Brian Rosher
comment: Auto dials passcodes while driving, saves time, saves lives
title: Saved my life

author: Pyrate Brewer
comment: So easy to connect to meetings, group calling, organize multiple calendars, poll meeting participants for the best time to meet.
title: Great features! Connect and organize

author: Tasha Melendez
comment: Clean Intuitive Calendar
title: Great App

author: win win
comment: You can't tell which calendar you are viewing if you have more than 1. Not very useful if that really is the case.
title: Can't differentiate more than 1 calendar

author: Mirsad Cekic
comment: Message stopped working shows very frequntly. Please fix asap.
title: Msg Stopped working

author: Erin ODwyer
comment: Great app for organizing your business day and having hands free meetings while driving.
title: Great organizational app

author: FRANKLIN TOBOR
comment: LOVING IT, :-)
title: AGENDAY

author: Arrah Jay
comment: My only issue thus far is that it opens to the title page EVERY time I open the app. That's precious time I have to wait before actually getting to my calendar. Annoying.
title: So far, so good

author: Jacob Medley
comment: I use some of the features but not all- it's nice to see Lync integration in a third-party app. If I didn't have to use Citrix Worx, I'd use this.
title: A decent calendar app

author: Reese Pollard
comment: This is a good calendar app I can use with my personal calendar. Unfortunately I cannot integrate it with my company's MDM managed calendar.

author: Stan Berger
comment: Incident Mgmt. Program Mgr.

author: Mike Jordan
comment: Useful for keeping track of all my daily events and is easy to use.
title: Great App and easy to use!

author: Linda Lynn
comment: Still working with some of the additional features but very user friendly.
title: Great app

author: Tushar Patel
comment: Greate app. Consolidates all events. Call international cheaper.
title: Go agenday

author: Diana Thomas
comment: Nice clean app. Has several useful functions.
title: Good calendar app

author: Keith Nicholson
comment: Like the simple clean interface and the consolidation
title: Keith Nicholson

author: Mardi Barnes
comment: Seemless.
title: Great App

author: Ethan M
comment: Works great as a primary calendar.  I think there is only one view,  but the default is fine with me. I don't care that the title screen loads every time. It should just go right to the calendar. Joining Skype for Business meetings is inconsistent at best.. Sometimes works sometimes does nothing.
title: My primary calendar
